guide.heading: Guid
guide.introduction: the wolf game is a traditional Moroccan game, where players take turns saying one of three specific words in a particular order: “did you see the wolf”  “I see it” and “did you see his tail” .
guide.objective: The game's objective is to continue saying on a loop these three words in the correct order without making a mistake or hesitating.
guide.example: For example: if the game says: “Did you see the wolf” you have to click “I saw it”. or if the game says: “Did you saw his tail” you should click “did you saw the wolf”
